text: It is the privilege of the gods to want nothing, and of godlike men to want little.
author: Diogenes

text: When two men in business always agree, one of them is unnecessary.
author: Ezra Pound

text: Men and women have strengths that complement each other.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

text: It's at the borders of pain and suffering that the men are separated from the boys.
author: Emil Zatopek
